Document.Title: VB: ADO; Flippant Remarks on ADO Asynchronous Connections

Content: I can only see using an Asynchronous connection when implementing ADO for a desktop solution. For a stateless IIS Application there is no waiting. It seems very linear to me: get in and get out. For more information regarding this matter please see MS KB articles Q190991 ("HOWTO: Trap for ADO Connection Errors Using WithEvents") and Q194960 ("HOWTO: Create an Asynchronous Connection in ADO").
